text: The Night of Nights is a 1939 American drama movie directed by Lewis Milestone and starring Pat O'Brien, Olympe Bradna, Roland Young, Reginald Gardiner, George E. Stone, Murray Alper, Richard Denning, Ethan Laidlaw. It was distributed by Paramount Pictures. ==Other websites== * The Night of Nights at the Internet Movie Database * The Night of Nights at Allmovie Category:1939 drama movies Category:1930s American drama movies Category:Movies directed by Lewis Milestone Category:Paramount Pictures movies
title: The Night of Nights
